#summary API Specification for Developers


= Boxes Classes =
You can create Pure data boxes using the following objects:
==Object==
{{{
Object(coord_x, coord_y, label)
}}}
where:
    _coord_x_ = x position of the box;

    _coord_y_ = y position of the box;

    _label_ = defines the kind of the object (eg: "dac~", "osc~ 440");

==Number==
{{{
Number(coord_x, coord_y)
}}}
where:
    _coord_x_ = x position of the box;

    _coord_y_ = y position of the box;

==Message==
{{{
Message(coord_x, coord_y, text)
}}}
where:
    _coord_x_ = x position of the box;

    _coord_y_ = y position of the box;

    _text_ = defines the content of the message;

==Comment==
{{{
Comment(coord_x, coord_y, text)
}}}
where:
    _coord_x_ = x position of the box;

    _coord_y_ = y position of the box;

    _text_ = defines the content of the comment;

==Symbol==
{{{
Symbol(coord_x, coord_y)
}}}
where:
    _coord_x_ = x position of the box;

    _coord_y_ = y position of the box;
